mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.owner_code AS "ownerCode", a.sku_code AS "skuCode", a.serial_no AS "serialNo", a.lot_num AS "lotNum", a.rec_ver AS "recVer", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.org_id AS "orgId"
LEFT JOIN sys_office so on a.org_id = so.id LEFT JOIN sys_user creater on creater.id = a.create_by LEFT JOIN sys_user updater on updater.id = a.update_by
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wm_inv_serial( id, owner_code, sku_code, serial_no, lot_num, rec_ver, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, org_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{ownerCode}, #{skuCode}, #{serialNo}, #{lotNum}, #{recVer}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{orgId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE wm_inv_serial SET owner_code = #{ownerCode}, sku_code = #{skuCode}, serial_no = #{serialNo}, lot_num = #{lotNum}, rec_ver = #{recVer} + 1, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id} AND rec_ver = #{recVer}
